pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Calculation of Region-Specific Fixation Index to Detect Local Adaptation // An R implementation of an extension of the 'BayeScan' software (Foll, 2008) DOI:10.1534/genetics.108.092221 for codominant markers, adding the option to group individual SNPs into pre-defined blocks. A typical application of this new approach is the identification of genomic regions, genes, or gene sets containing one or more SNPs that evolved under directional selection.
